entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:09 p.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 13.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 3:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 13.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 40 km
Humidity: 42 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
